duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze personal finance data and review various financial products and deals for publication on Kiplinger.com.
Write reviews, guides, and articles on personal finance products for the website.
Develop reports to create rankings and comparisons of personal finance products.
Create charts, tables, and graphs to present data in an effective format.
Collaborate with the personal finance team to manage coverage involving data and analyses.
Provide creative problem-solving to develop analyses and work within the content management system.

education_certification.credential: Working knowledge of personal finance products, including credit cards, mortgages, savings accounts, etc. Editorial writing experience.
